title: New: Shlohmo – Later
content:
Fuck me, when Shlohmo goes hard, he really goes hard. Later is the first tune to drop from his upcoming Laid Out EP, due out on Friends of Friends on March 5. Centered around a cut throat vocal sample that tears away at the ear, carving and shredding until some sort of sonic beauty emerges, the track achieves something centered and dramatic, but manages to do it in the funnest way possible. It’s an ecstatic overdoss for the senses.

01 DON’T SAY NO (FEAT. HOW TO DRESS WELL)
02 OUT OF HAND
03 LATER
04 PUT IT
05 WITHOUT
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
